Sequence Information.Peptide Name: THP-1 (Turkey Heterophil Peptide 1, THP1,THP 1; natural AMPs;  avian beta-defensin, UCSS1a; 3S=S; birds, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification: Three disulfide bonds.Activity: active against C. albicans (MIC 8 ug/ml), B. avium (MIC 8 ug/ml), E. coli (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. enteriditis (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC 4 ug/ml), C. jejuni (MIC 2 ug/ml), P-multocida (MIC >16 ug/ml), M. gallisepticum (MIC 8 ug/ml) (Evans et al., 1995. THP1 killed S. aureus and E. coli in vitro. Updated 7/2021, Jan2023.
Literature Information.Author: Evans EW, Beach GG, Wunderlich J, Harmon BG.1994
Literature Information.Title: Isolation of antimicrobial peptides from avian heterophils.
